updog
  • Reference

Reference version 0.1.0

All functions

bbpost_double

Posterior inference under the beta-binomial model with outliers. If od_param = 0, then this reduces to the binomial model with outliers.

bb_post

Posterior inference in beta-binomial model.

bbpost_tot

Posterior inference for each individual.

bb_simple_post

Simple posterior inference for beta-binomial when ncounts and ssize are only length 1.

bin_post

Calculates posterior probabilities of a genotype given just the sequence counts.

colSums_cpp

Stupid implementation of colSums because I guess not implemented in Rcpp sugar.

dbetabinom_cpp

An Rcpp version of the dbetabinom.

dbetabinom_mu_rho_cpp_double

double version of betabinomial density.

dbetabinom_mu_rho_cpp

An Rcpp version of dbetabinom_mu_rho.

dbetabinom_mu_rho

beta-binomial density function in terms of mean and correlation.

dbetabinom

Beta-binomial density function.

dbeta_dd

Derivative of betabinomial density w.r.t. original bias parameter.

dbeta_deps

Derivative of beta density w.r.t. sequencing error rate.

dbeta_dh

Derivative of overdispersion parameter of beta density.

dbeta_dl

Derivative of beta density w.r.t. unconstrained parameterization of sequencing error.

dbeta_dprop

Derivative of mean of beta density.

dbeta_dr_ell

Same as dbeta_dh, but with same inputs as dbeta_ds and dbeta_dl.

dbeta_dr

Derivative of beta(x|n, xi, r), where r = log(h) from dbeta_dh.

dbeta_ds

Derivative of betabinomial density w.r.t. bias parameter.

dbeta_dtau

Derivative of beta(x|n, xi, tau).

dbeta_dtau_withxi

Derivative of overdispersion parameter with mean already calculated

dd_ds

Just a wrapper for std::exp.

deps_dell

Derivative of exp(ell) / (1 + exp(ell))

df_deps

Returns derivative of p(1 - eps) + (1 - p) * eps

dh_dr

Just a wrapper for std::exp.

dh_dtau

Derivative of h(tau) = (1 - tau) / tau.

dhyper_cpp

Vectorized version of dhyper for C++ implementation.

dupdog

Returns log-likelihood of updog object.

dxi_dd

Derivative w.r.t. d of xi(d, f) = f / (d * (1 - f) + f)

dxi_df

Returns derivative to f / (d * (1 - f) + f)

est_seq_error

Estimate sequencing error from counts.

est_seq_post

Use posterior probabilities to update the estimated sequencing error.

expit

The expit function.

get_dimname

Returns a vector character strings that are all of the possible combinations of the reference allele and the non-reference allele.

get_out_prop

E step in EM algorithm for a single individual.

get_parent_outprop

E-step for the parents.

get_prob_geno

Rcpp function to get genotype probabilities assuming either F1 population given parental genotypes, the allele frequencies assuming Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium, or just a uniform distribution.

get_pvec

Gets all possible binomial probabilities for a given ploidy, bias term, and sequencing error rate.

get_q_array_cpp

Rcpp implementation of get_q_array.

get_q_array

Derive the probabilities of an offspring's genotype given its parental genotypes for all possible combinations of parental and offspring genotypes.

get_transition_mat

Get the transition probabilities from going from one ploidy to another assuming a constant error rate.

good_bb_obj

Objective function for non-outlier model

grad_offspring_mat_original

Gradient of obj_offspring for each individual. This is in the original parameterization.

grad_offspring_mat

Gradient of obj_offspring_reparam for each individual.

grad_offspring_original

Gradient of obj_offspring using the original parameterization.

grad_offspring

Gradient of obj_offspring_reparam.

grad_offspring_weights_original

Gradient of obj_offspring_weights using original parameterization

grad_offspring_weights

Gradient of obj_offspring_weights_reparam

grad_parent

Gradient of obj_parent (when outlier = FALSE) with respect to bias_val, seq_error, and od_param. Basically, this just calculates derivatives of the log beta-binomial density.

grad_parent_reparam

The gradient of obj_parent_reparam with respect to s, ell, and r, which recall are reparameterizations of the bias, seqeuncing error, and overdispersion, respectively.

grad_wrapp_all

wrapper for grad_offspring_weights

is.updog

Tests if its argument is an updog.

logsumexp

Log-sum-exponential trick that I use all the time.

obj_offspring

Objective function for the offspring.

obj_offspring_reparam

Just a reparameterization of obj_offspring.

obj_offspring_vec

Vector of objective functions for offspring.

obj_offspring_weights

Same thing as obj_offspring, but each sample's log-density has a weight.

obj_offspring_weights_reparam

Reparameterization of obj_offspring_weights.

obj_parent

Parent contribution to objective function.

obj_parent_reparam

A reparameterization of obj_parent

obj_wrapp_all

wrapper for obj_offspring_weights_reparam

out_grad_parent

Gradient function for dbetabinom_mu_rho_cpp_double.

out_grad_wrapp

Wrapper for outlier_grad.

outlier_bb_obj

Objective function for outlier model.

outlier_grad

The gradient of outlier_obj.

outlier_obj

Objective function of outlier part in EM step

out_obj_wrapp

Wrapper for outlier_obj.

pbias_double

A double version of pbias.

pbias

Returns the probability of seeing the reference allele after including the mapping-bias and the sequencing-error.

plot_beta_dist_gg

Plot the beta distribution using ggplot2.

plot_beta_dist

Plot the beta distribution.

plot_geno_base

The base R graphics version of plot_geno.

plot_geno

Make a genotype plot.

plot_problines

Plots the genotype lines for a given sequencing error rate, bias parameter, and ploidy.

plot

Draw a genotype plot from the output of updog.

rbetabinom_mu_rho

Draw from beta-binomial distribution parameterized by mean and overdispersion parameter.

rupdog

Samples counts using the parameter values in an updog object.

screen_oracle

Returns the distribution of proportion of individuals genotyped correctly using an the oracle estimator when the parameter values equal the estimated values.

snpdat

GBS data from Shirasawa et al (2017)

summary

Summary method for class "updog".

up_bb_fix

EM iteration for overdispersed binomial mixture model.

up_bb_obj

Objective function for overdispersed binomial mixture model

update_good

Update the OK points

updog_iterate

Iterate between indiividual level estimates and joint averaging.

updog_maximize

Estimate parental genotypes using offspring genotypes.

updog_mcmc

The updog Gibbs sampler to jointly estimate the parental and offspring genotypes.

updog_old

Using Parental Data for Offspring Genotyping.

updog

Using Parental Data for Offspring Genotyping.

updog_update_all

This is the main optimization function for updog.

updog_vanilla

Using Parental Data for Offspring Genotyping.

up_fix

Fixed-point iteration for updog EM.

up_max_bb

EM algorithm for over-dispersed mixture model.

up_obj

The objective function
